t=int(raw_input())
while t>0:
    t-=1
    total=0
    n=int(raw_input())
    p=raw_input()
    p=map(int, p.split())   
    r=raw_input()
    r=map(int, r.split())
    
    while n>0:
        n-=1
        p1=min(p)
        r1=min(r)
        if p1<=r1:
            total+=1
            p.remove(p1)
            r.remove(r1)
        else:
            r.remove(r1)
    print(total)
